## Installation
`pip install pr_colored`

## Usage
`from pr_colored.pr_colored import pr`


`pr(DATABASE)`
`pr(DATABASE, 'green')`

## colors:
`'grey', 'red', 'green', 'yellow', 'blue', 'magenta', 'cyan', 'white'`
